con:interface.name: CARMIN a Common web API for Remote pipeline INvocation
con:interface.con:description: FLI/IAM REST API for exchanging data and remote calling pipelines.

con:method.name: listExecutions
con:method.con:description: list all execution Ids in the platform which are ordered in decreasing submission time. All the executions that were launched by the user must be returned. It is up to the platform to return executions that the user did not launch. When studyIdentifier is present, all the executions that the user launched in the study must be returned.

con:method.name: initExecution
con:method.con:description: Initializes an execution. Does not start it. The successful response must contain the execution identifier.

con:method.name: initAndStartExecution
con:method.con:description: Initializes an execution and start it. The successful response must contain the execution identifier.

con:method.name: updateExecution
con:method.con:description: Modify an execution. Only the name and des timeout of the execution can be modified. Changes to the identifier or the status will raise errors. Changes to the other properties will be ignored.

con:method.name: deleteExecution
con:method.con:description: Delete an execution. This will kill the underlying processes (if possible) and free all resources associated with this execution (depending of the configuration given in as body input).

con:method.name: getExecutionResults
con:method.con:description: get the result files of the execution

con:parameter.con:name: protocol
con:parameter.con:description: if not specified the default protocol is https

con:method.name: listPipelines
con:method.con:description: All the pipelines that the user can execute must be returned. It is up to the platform to return pipelines that the user cannot execute. When studyIdentifier is present, all the pipelines that the user can execute in the study must be returned. In this case, execution rights denote the rights to execute the pipeline in the study.

con:method.name: getPipeline
con:method.con:description: Show the definition of a given pipeline

con:method.name: getPlatformProperties
con:method.con:description: Returns information about the platform. https must be supported in the list of the supported protocols.
